stun.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to surprise or upset someone so much that they do not react immediately
stun.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Redfern stunned the crowd with a last-minute goal.
stun.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to make someone unconscious for a short time
stun.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: The impact of the ball had stunned her.
